segments.text: I can't help but notice the state of the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is running full force from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling the basin and then just flowing right over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A steady sheet of water cascades down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It then forms a puddle that's spreading quite quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of all that wasted water is rather bothersome.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the wooden cabinets if it continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The reflection of the window light on the spreading puddle is almost ironic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a pristine light highlighting such a growing mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn the faucet off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a slow-motion disaster unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of the running water must be quite loud.
segments.speaker: PAR
